name: Words with Shakespeare
description:
Love words and theater? Play Words with Shakespeare!

Welcome onto beautiful stages where you will fill in missing words in excerpts from William Shakespeare's plays. Play the game today and by and by you will find yourself immersed in the English playwright's wonderful world of words.

HOW TO PLAY:
You will get excerpts from Shakespeare's plays, with some words missing. Fill in the missing words by tapping letters in the right order.

FEATURES:
* Simple-to-Play and Fun!
* No time limit
* Great Brain-exercise
* Learn (or get reminded of) 560 exciting excerpts from Shakespeare.
* Trivia of the plays
* More than 1000 words are available to figure out, in different grammatical forms.

*** Presently you can choose to play with words from 14 plays, these are:
- The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark
- The Tragedy of Macbeth
- Romeo and Juliet
- King Lear
- The Merchant of Venice
- The Comedy of Errors
- Love's Labour's Lost
- The Taming of the Shrew
- King John
- The Two Gentlemen of Verona
- King Henry VI Part I
- King Henry VI Part II
- King Henry VI Part III
- Richard III
